items.sentence: Tom said he didn\'t care about Mary\'s past even though he really did.
Can you remember the time we visited Tom when he was still a teenager?
Tom doesn\'t want to be a doctor, although he\'s very good at science.
I don\'t think Tom is the kind of guy who would do that kind of thing.
Luckily, I wasn\'t on the bus when it ran off the road into the river.
I\'m afraid that I won\'t be able to make myself understood in French.
I\'ve looked for Tom everywhere, but I haven\'t been able to find him.
After I graduated from college, I got a job with my father\'s company.
He just won\'t listen. Talking to him is like talking to a brick wall.
I have nothing in common with Tom so I don\'t know what to talk about.
